# Load necessary libraries

```{r}

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
library(networkD3)

```

# Set theme

```{r}

theme_set(
  theme_bw(20) +
    theme(panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
          panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
          panel.border = element_rect(colour="black", fill = NA, size = 1),
          axis.text = element_text(colour="black"),
          axis.ticks = element_line(colour="black"),
          axis.text.x = element_text(angle=0),
          legend.title = element_text(size = 10),
          legend.text = element_text(size = 7)))

```

# Load TCRseq data

```{r}

tcr_seq <- read.csv("../saved_data/tcr_seq_features.csv") %>%
  select(-X)

tcr_seq

```

# Prep df for VJ bar plots

```{r}

interesting_v_genes <- tcr_seq %>%
  select(Patient_ID, predicted.celltype.l1, predicted.celltype.l2, barcode, Chain, v_gene, j_gene, c_gene, irAE) %>%
  filter(predicted.celltype.l1 != "other T") %>%
  group_by(v_gene, irAE, predicted.celltype.l1, Patient_ID) %>%
  summarize(count = n()) %>%
  group_by(Patient_ID) %>%
  mutate(normalized_count = count / sum(count)) %>%
  group_by(v_gene, irAE, predicted.celltype.l1) %>%
  summarize(median = median(normalized_count)) %>%
  group_by(v_gene, predicted.celltype.l1) %>%
  mutate(median_differential = if_else(irAE == "Yes", median - lag(median), NA)) %>%
  arrange(-abs(median_differential)) %>%
  head(10)

v_genes <- tcr_seq %>%
  select(Patient_ID, predicted.celltype.l1, predicted.celltype.l2, barcode, Chain, v_gene, j_gene, c_gene, irAE) %>%
  filter(predicted.celltype.l1 != "other T") %>%
  group_by(v_gene, irAE, predicted.celltype.l1, Patient_ID) %>%
  summarize(count = n()) %>%
  group_by(Patient_ID) %>%
  mutate(normalized_count = count / sum(count)) %>%
  filter(v_gene %in% interesting_v_genes$v_gene)

interesting_j_genes <- tcr_seq %>%
  select(Patient_ID, predicted.celltype.l1, predicted.celltype.l2, barcode, Chain, v_gene, j_gene, c_gene, irAE) %>%
  filter(predicted.celltype.l1 != "other T") %>%
  group_by(j_gene, irAE, predicted.celltype.l1, Patient_ID) %>%
  summarize(count = n()) %>%
  group_by(Patient_ID) %>%
  mutate(normalized_count = count / sum(count)) %>%
  group_by(j_gene, irAE, predicted.celltype.l1) %>%
  summarize(median = median(normalized_count)) %>%
  group_by(j_gene, predicted.celltype.l1) %>%
  mutate(median_differential = if_else(irAE == "Yes", median - lag(median), NA)) %>%
  arrange(-abs(median_differential)) %>%
  head(10)

j_genes <- tcr_seq %>%
  select(Patient_ID, predicted.celltype.l1, predicted.celltype.l2, barcode, Chain, v_gene, j_gene, c_gene, irAE) %>%
  filter(predicted.celltype.l1 != "other T") %>%
  group_by(j_gene, irAE, predicted.celltype.l1, Patient_ID) %>%
  summarize(count = n()) %>%
  group_by(Patient_ID) %>%
  mutate(normalized_count = count / sum(count)) %>%
  filter(j_gene %in% interesting_j_genes$j_gene)

#c_genes <- tcr_seq %>%
#  select(Patient_ID, predicted.celltype.l1, predicted.celltype.l2, barcode, Chain, v_gene, j_gene, c_gene, irAE) %>%
#  group_by(c_gene, irAE) %>%
#  summarize(count = n())

```

# Just make bar plots for VJ gene usages by irAE group

```{r}

p <- ggplot(v_genes, aes(x = v_gene, y = log10(normalized_count), fill = irAE)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  facet_wrap(~predicted.celltype.l1) +
  labs(x = "", y = "Normalized count (log10)") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1, size = 12))

# Adjust y-axis scales with a specified number of ticks
p + scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0.1, 0.5)), breaks = pretty_breaks(n = 3))

p <- ggplot(j_genes, aes(x = j_gene, y = log10(normalized_count), fill = irAE)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  facet_wrap(~predicted.celltype.l1) +
  labs(x = "", y = "Normalized count (log10)") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1, size = 12))

# Adjust y-axis scales with a specified number of ticks
p + scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(mult = c(0.1, 0.5)), breaks = pretty_breaks(n = 3))

# Filter the data for statistical test
test_data <- j_genes %>%
  filter(j_gene == "TRAJ7",
         predicted.celltype.l1 == "CD4 T")

# Calculate the Wilcoxon rank-sum test statistic and p-value
wilcox_result <- wilcox.test(test_data$normalized_count ~ test_data$irAE)

# Print the results
print(wilcox_result)

# TRAV12-CD8 T: 0.01593
# TRAV17-CD4 T: 0.01052
# TRAJ7-CD4 T: 0.004169

```

# Make Sankey plot for TRA yes irAE

```{r}

yes_irae_alpha_sankey <- tcr_seq %>%
  filter(chain == "TRA",
         irAE == "Yes") %>%
  select(v_gene, j_gene)
  
yes_irae_alpha_sankey_nodes <- data.frame(nodes = unique(c(unique(yes_irae_alpha_sankey$v_gene), unique(yes_irae_alpha_sankey$j_gene))))

gene_pair_counts <- table(yes_irae_alpha_sankey$v_gene, yes_irae_alpha_sankey$j_gene)

yes_irae_alpha_sankey_links <- as.data.frame(gene_pair_counts)

colnames(yes_irae_alpha_sankey_links) <- c("v_gene", "j_gene", "Count")

yes_irae_alpha_sankey_links <- yes_irae_alpha_sankey_links %>%
  arrange(-Count) %>%
  head(75)

yes_irae_alpha_sankey_nodes <- yes_irae_alpha_sankey_nodes %>%
  filter(nodes %in% yes_irae_alpha_sankey_links$v_gene | nodes %in% yes_irae_alpha_sankey_links$j_gene) %>%
  mutate(row_number = row_number())

yes_irae_alpha_sankey_links$v_gene <- yes_irae_alpha_sankey_nodes$row_number[match(yes_irae_alpha_sankey_links$v_gene, yes_irae_alpha_sankey_nodes$nodes)] - 1

yes_irae_alpha_sankey_links$j_gene <- yes_irae_alpha_sankey_nodes$row_number[match(yes_irae_alpha_sankey_links$j_gene, yes_irae_alpha_sankey_nodes$nodes)] - 1

p <- sankeyNetwork(Links = yes_irae_alpha_sankey_links, Nodes = yes_irae_alpha_sankey_nodes, Source = "v_gene",
             Target = "j_gene", Value = "Count", NodeID = "nodes", fontSize = 12, nodeWidth = 30)
p

```
